item.title: Rhetoric, the Socratic Method, and Pedagogy
item.description: 2017 Students Partnering for Undergraduate Rhetoric Success (SPURS) Winter Conference. Items covered including strategies and tactics for applying the socratic method and social science methodology to rhetoric instruction in high schools.
